summary: A relatively large manor, which is located near Dragon Bridge. It includes some truly unique furnishings, including a dynamic wardrobe.
descriptionHtml:
A rather pleasant manor near Dragon Bridge. it includes dynamic and interactive furniture, but it is not yet complete. This is due to the help of DavideMitra, who provided me with a tutorial as of how to do it. You should check out his best mod - The House of the Redguard - (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54162/?).

The house is not yet finished, but is around seven tenths of the way there, as it only needs a little more furniture, and some other great additions.

When you approach the door, you will notice that it is locked with 'master'. Go back outside, and face the door, from the grass. Look right down, and you will notice something, probably. A small lockbox, containing the key.

Note: The house is most certainly WIP, but is mostly done. Don't want to see it half-made? Then just click 'track'.
author: Svadas
